name: Valence Discovery
description: Valence is unlocking the true potential of deep learning in drug design by unifying best-in-class deep learning technologies with intuitive infrastructure to allow any drug discovery team to become AI-enabled. We're proudly headquartered at Mila.
one_liner: Valence is unlocking the true potential of deep learning in drug design by unifying best-in-class deep learning technologies with intuitive infrastructure to allow any drug discovery team to become AI-enabled. We're proudly headquartered at Mila.
